item.title: Items donator only..?
item.dc:creator: @FinalFantasy FinalFantasy
item.description:
@FinalFantasy wrote:

i see the problem

use this instead:

characterfile.newLine();
characterfile.write("character-donator = ", 0, 16);
characterfile.write(Integer.toString(donator), 0, Integer.toString(donator).length());
if(wearID == ITEMID && donator == 0){
sendMessage("You need to be member to wield this!");
return false;
}

item.title: Items donator only..?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Hmm, I’m not sure. Something with the int.

Alright, delete that, and under -

public boolean wear(int wearID, int slot) {

Add -

if(wearID == ITEM ID && donateZ == 0){ sendMessage("You need to be member to wield this!"); return false; }
Add another one of those for each item that you want to be a donator item.

item.title: Items donator only..?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“noobie22, post:10, topic:268400”]if(8002 == donatorZ[] && donatorZ == 0){ ^ client.java:18156: '.class' expected if(8003 == donatorZ[] && donatorZ == 0){ ^ client.java:18160: '.class' expected if(8004 == donatorZ[] && donatorZ == 0){ ^ client.java:18164: '.class' expected if(8005 == donatorZ[] && donatorZ == 0){ ^ client.java:18168: '.class' expected if(8006 == donatorZ[] && donatorZ == 0){ ^ client.java:18172: '.class' expected if(8007 == donatorZ[] && donatorZ == 0){[/quote]
Delete that code. All you need is -

if(wearID == donatorZ[] && donatorZ == 0){ sendMessage("You need to be member to wield this!"); return false; }

You didn’t need to fill in the item ID’s for each one. They are already listed in the public int donatorZ[] = {};

Read full topic

item.title: Items donator only..?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

It probably won’t work, needs a few adjustments. Add all in your client class.

Under -

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

Add-

public int donatorZ[] = {####, ####, ####};

Under -

characterfile = new BufferedWriter

Add -

characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("character-donator = ", 0, 16); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(donatorZ), 0, Integer.toString(donatorZ).length());

Under -

public boolean wear(int wearID, int slot) {

Add -

if(wearID == donatorZ[] && donatorZ == 0){ sendMessage("You need to be member to wield this!"); return false; }

Read full topic
